page.title: 16Gloucester Country Club.
page.content: The Country Club is a sort of leisure centre on Robinswood Hill.They provid the following sports and leisure activitles.squash, tennis,dry skiing. The ski slope is an artificial one and is very long and undulates a great deal.All equipment is provided and it costs three pounds per session.The golf is played on the hill on one nine and one eighteen hole courses.They also have a few tennis and squash courts. There is a BMX track.Which children up to the age of sixteen can ride around on specially constructed bicycles called BMX bicycles.
